PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The PSCs fabricated from PTATDPP and PTAFDPP with PC71BM exhibit PCEs as high as 7.02% and 5.22% , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the Property Value entities in the given paragraph:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 7.02% |
| 5.22% |

The Property Value entities in the paragraph are the percentages of PCEs (Power Conversion Efficiency) exhibited by the PSCs (Perovskite Solar Cells) fabricated from PTATDPP and PTAFDPP with PC71BM.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid Property Value entities:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 7.02% |
| 5.22% |

The original paragraph mentions two Property Value entities:

1. 7.02% - the PCE of PSCs fabricated from PTATDPP
2. 5.22% - the PCE of PSCs fabricated from PTAFDPP

These two entities clearly refer to the value of material properties, specifically the power conversion efficiency of the perovskite solar cells.
